page.title: 14LEISURE
page.content: LEISURE. GOLF There is A golf club in Downview AVENUE called FortWillam golf club. It has 18 holes.there is A club house with A restaurant,bar and A dance hall. The pro shop is A small place,the walls are lined with golf clubs.They call the bar 19th. The professional golfer gives lessons to people who wish to improve their game. Leisure Centre Lough Side Leisure. It has A small cafe,two outdoor pitches and one indoor pitch. VALLY LEISURE. It has A cafe a selection of arcade games,three main halls and two swiming pools. Tennis There are tennis courts up the North Circular RD to the old Cavehill RD.
